ygData.subject: Re: ooC: people...
ygData.msgSnippet:
OOC:  Hey, watch it there.  (This is not intended to be a flame)  First of
all, I just wanted to have an interesting entrance, you know, make  people
notice.

OOC:  Hey, watch it there.  (This is not intended to be a flame)  First of
=
all, I just wanted to have an interesting entrance, you know, make  people
=
notice.  Also, as for Skulletron/Slaughter having potential, that is a big
=
understatement, if you look  back on the olden days   of NBWRPG(the better
=
days) I had the "potential" to be one of the top RPers.  As I have ranted o=
n
about before, I am nowhere  near to being new to this RPG.  But thank you=

for the compliment, Skulletron was my first character, and this is the....=
.
3rd time, I believe....that I have brought him back.  I have always taken=
 my
characters seriously, and unlike my buddy Hollywood Narrator over there=
(this
is not an insult  to you, HN) I always do "serious" characters.  Some=
 of my
best works include Skulletron, Decadel, Necromancer, Hell Drak, and.=
....
actually, I consider just about all of my old characters to be good wo=
rks. 
I am also impressed with the characters and plots I see now, and I lo=
ok
forward to bringing back old characters, debuting brand new ones,  and
i=
nteracting with you guys...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 05, 2002 07:48:16 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: ooC: people...

I'll stop when they do.  But Rauq, even you have to admit that HNC's=20
inaugural rp post wasn't worth the time it took to read the first=20
line, let alone the whole thing.  And Lurker's start-up is the most=20
over-dramatized entrance I've ever seen - all you need is a shot of=20
Dr. Frankenstein throwing a switch and it's a ripoff of every single=20
horror movie out there. =20

It's improved somewhat since then.

As far as characters are concerned, Terminion and=20
Skullertron/Slaughter actually display both personality and=20
potential.  The remaining four have been cannon-fodder thus far.

That's my opinion and it's up to you guys to prove me right or wrong=20
by roleplaying, not bitching.  And this is a serious RPG, not a=20
slapstick movie, so if I see another post/exchange like HNC's first=20
one, where everyone involved is an absolute idiot, I will ingore=20
every post thereafter made by the perpetrator(s) regardless of who=20
they are or think they are.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> I've been lurking around for those wondering. Megatron is waiting=20
in=20
> the control room for the Predacons, most of which are 'busy' or=20
> something. I really don't have much to post about right now, but I=20
> still have to read the posts up till when i last checked em.
>=20
> I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this obviously aint=20
> getting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal shields*
>=20
> First think that needs to happen is a cease fire in this flame war=20
> between cardhead, lurker, and narrator. it started wrong right from=20
> the start. certain things which shouldn't have been said, were=20
said,=20
> and the replies were less than sucessful at defusing the situation=20
> and it blew up.=20
>=20
> cardhead, if you don't like Narrator's posting style, that's your=20
> problem. Telling him that you don't like it, with a bunch of=20
> senseless slander isn't going to make him post the way you'd like=20
> him to post.
>=20
> Narrator, keep ooc comments out of your posting, if you want to say=20
> something, say it and no pot shots. And I find it really hard to=20
> believe that you managed to put 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up'=20
in=20
> the same context.
>=20
> If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up about this=20
> stupid arguement, and get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can=20
> say now short of an appologies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me=20
> that anyone is growing up.
>=20
> *preps for backlash*


Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
ADVERTISEMENT
